After the frogmore, we were off to New Orleans!
I swear! If y'all could find a way to ship this 1 days rain to Cali, you could end our decades long drought!
Jeez people! How has this state not floated away yet?!
Or sink?
(Atlantis?)

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
(Even though I was paying for it!)
Nope, she demanded another/cheaper option  further across town. 

I swear, my bed sounded like it was mounted on a steel drum, or a thin steel cookie sheet.
(think 'wobbly steel sound, w/ rhythm!)

But... at least I was clean and stretched out!

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
In the cubby hole/bathroom.
Showering/dressing in the size of a linen closet is...
Frustrating, at best.
Bear stuffed in a burlap sack, in a small fridge box is more apropos.
Only 40 mile detour, I saw two nice hotels.
She fought me tooth n nail because 'they were 2 expensive!"

text:

I needed a break from my Mom.
I demanded a nite in a hotel.
I needed to soak in a hot shower,
And scream into a pillow.

There is NO PRIVACY whatsoever!
I'm a rather 'large' guy. 
(6'2" 300+lbs)
I don't fit well

text:

text:

I hadn't had those since I was a kid. 

Man, the way great food takes you back...

By the way:
She decided to cook them,
@ Noon!
It's 85% humidity here in Clarkesdale MS!

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
My Mommy-
I'm ready to go, what's taking you so long?!

"Are you SURE you're ready to go?
Anything else before we pull out?"

No, would you stop pestering me?
Let's GOO!

(*puts RV in gear*)
Oh, wait, one more thing..!
(*4 tasks later*)

"You sure THIS time?!"
(*moves*)
*CLANG!*

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
As two of the jeep owners walk from behind one of the jeeps to gawk at my Mom for being so... brash.
(I thought it was a rude statement, but, I proudly stated:
"Offroaders are great people! These are people I'd roll with!
(If they let in Dodge's!)"
They laughed.
life goes on.

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
My Mom is, shall we say,  rather 'high brow', as she has traveled the world, and befriended a large consortium of rich folk. 
As we walk in, she loudly proclaims:
"Are we gonna die in here?"
(2 elderly Blacks walking into a back woods hangout spot)

"No,Ma, we'll be fine!"

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
So...
We pull into a tiny town, 
And a local lady recommends a GREAT place to get fried fish.
We show up @ 'The Haystack'.
(It's a triple wide home, made into a club/bar/restaurant)
A buncha high end/tricked out jeeps from a local offroad club are parked out front.

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
It's a game now. 
I try and predict what she's left hidden on one of the chairs ar the last second, that will sail off,  and bounce across the floor.

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
Every time we make a plan to drive, I ask her THREE TIMES,
"Mom, didja secure your stuff?"

Yes, dammit, stop asking!

(*first turn, or stop, bring crashing/clanging noises from back of RV*)

WHAT WAS THAT?!

"Gee Mom, I dunno. 
Maybe something you forgot to secure?"

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:
First fun fact:
Load up the RV.
She has a 21yr old poodle. Walking frantically back n forth in rv.
"Mom, your pup needs 2 pee."
No she doesn't, leave her alone. 

(*1 minute later*)
Pee runs down between front seats...

"Oh dayumn... here we go."

author: Hutch Wreckz
text:

I figured I'd start a thread of the daily comedic nonsense we're going thru.

I hope you enjoy them.
